description: This file defines an in-memory implementation of a user repository for a notes management backend, providing basic add and retrieval operations.

classes.name: InMemoryUserRepository
classes.description: A simple in-memory repository managing User objects for demo purposes, implementing IUserRepository.

methods.name: Add
methods.description: Adds a User to the in-memory list of users.

methods.name: GetById
methods.description: Retrieves a User by their unique identifier (GUID).

methods.name: GetByUsername
methods.description: Retrieves a User by their username, case-insensitive.
